reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a small hotel with excellently designed contemporary decor. Friendly staff, very good breakfasts, nice bar etc. all in a central location very close to the cathedral. You can't go wrong.
reviews.title: Charming, friendly and well-located boutique hotel

reviews.text: Great Hotel, good bathrooms and great location. Lovely bedlinen also.
reviews.title: Nice Boutique Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything here was spot on - location, welcome, bar, breakfast, room, friendly service. No need to say anything else !
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: For the price 290 euro per night there are lots of more shall offer.
reviews.title: B&b a.k.a lux hotel wannabe?

reviews.text: Hotel has no doubt one of the best location, room interior are pretty in details. If you go for simple design it's a good choice. That's why I guess they dare to asking for a 5 stars hotels's rate. However the service are offering are much lower than they are asking for.
reviews.title: Cocooning in tranquility in the middle of the old town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I recently spent 1 night at the Julien hotel as a birthday celebration.
reviews.title: Totally Relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We absolutely loved everything about the hotel, from the design, the ambience, the simple but very good breakfast and although small, we also pampered ourselves to an hour in the spa early morning before breakfast.
reviews.title: Design in the heart of the town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is not cheap but compared to other hotels in Antwerpen this is our favourite so far.
reviews.title: Love the location, fabulous design hotel and so quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will be back - next time for longer!
reviews.title: Nice hotel, but dishonest commnunication and low value-for-money.

reviews.text: Very nice design boutique hotel in the heart of the old town. Ideal for a weekend-citytrip.
reviews.title: Great city but highly overrated location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is excellent, with a very well executed mix of modern design and art in a historic setting. You enter another realm upon accessing the hotel. The atmosphere is cosmopolitan and welcoming. Location is very good, right in the city centre and also easily accessible by car (there are public parkings nearby).
reviews.title: Does it get any better???

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But what truly makes a difference is the fantastic service and all the smart (design) details:
reviews.title: lovely, calm and luxurious

reviews.text: - friendly and motivated staff providing personalized service. Thank you Marc for the all too familiar stories.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - delicious breakfast, with fresh and organic products.
reviews.title: Small, well located spa hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - free wi-fi throughout the hotel, with a good connection speed.
reviews.title: THIS N° 1 ?
Exceded expectations
reviews.text: We arrived in Antwerp after staying in the fabulous Sofitel louise in Brussels for a week. We were not sure if the hotel would live up to the excellent standards we had seen at Sofitel, but it more than met our expectations.

We found the hotel with no problems - it is literally 25 minutes walk from the station down the main shopping street, then a couple of simple turns. It is an easy walk through nice and fairly modern streets.
reviews.title: The perfect city hotel

reviews.text: The reception area is pleasant and we were greeted warmly, despite it being mid-morning. They apologised that our room was not ready, not a surprise or problem given we were so early, and told we could leave our luggage. We left our coats too as it was a warm day.
reviews.title: An amazing hotel with incredible service

reviews.text: The receptionist gave us a map of Antwerp and gave us some ideas where to go. We headed off after being told our room would be ready at 3.
reviews.title: Truly beautiful and so boutique...

reviews.text: We turned left out of the hotel away from the direction we had approached. We found ourselves in the beautiful old town. The hotel is located where the old town meets the modern shopping streets - a great location.
reviews.title: I adore this hotel...its one of the reasons i fell in love with Antwerp
